Description:
You draw in power from your held berry, releasing it into a ranged attack. Make a ranged attack, dealing damage on a hit. The type is dependant on what berry you are holding, according to the chart below:

Aspear, Pomeg, Yache: Ice
Babiri, Razz: Steel
Charti: Rock
Cheri, Occa: Fire
Chesto, Passho: Water
Chilan: Normal
Chople, Kelpsy, Leppa: Fighting
Coba, Grepa, Lum: Flying
Colbur: Dark
Haban: Dragon
Hondew, Persim, Shuca: Ground
Kasib: Ghost
Kebia, Oran, Qualot: Poison
Payapa, Sitrus, Tamato: Psychic
Pecha, Wacan: Electric
Rawst, Rindo: Grass
Roseli: Fairy
Tanga: Bug
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
